item.title: 1.12.86-alpha
item.description:
NOTE: Auto update was broken by an external component or GitHub breaking change which is outside of my control. If an update fails please update manually to at least v1.11.30 which fixes this problem.
RELEASE INFO: * Update dependencies * Fix bug when sometimes the ignore button would not be re-enabled after ignoring\resolving a conflict * Fix CTD when quickly switching the conflict definitions * Fix CTD in conflict solver image viewer * Fix editor hotkeys being suspended by Irony's own global hotkeys * Fix hotkey reorder mod visual bug related to numeric textbox width
CHANGES FROM v1.11: * Update dependencies * Various minor fixes * Add Spanish translation (by Werety) * Removed advanced mod merge (use compress instead) * German localization changes (by Cranky) * Added periodic permission check which verifies whether Irony is blocked by AV * Added DLC Manager * Fix issue in certain cases where Irony autofix caused game items to not show due to dependency load cycle (this is a breaking change) * Round up numeric values in script values to allow Irony for even greater precision when comparing definition code (this is a breaking change) * Irony patch mod control added (ability to disable it, ability to delete it) * Wrap certain IO functions into retry strategy to hopefully prevent any CTDs (in cases where a file is locked) * Image preview fixes and improvements * Image preview should now show dds cubemaps properly * Add keyboard shortcuts * Reduce conflict solver memory usage (in testing ~300 mods in v1.11 used ~5.2GB of memory and v1.12 ~2.8GB) * Show notification if Irony cannot import a certain mod in a collection

NOTE: Auto update was broken by an external component or GitHub breaking change which is outside of my control. If an update fails please update manually to at least v1.11.30 which fixes this problem.
RELEASE INFO: * Updates chinese translation (by LunarTraveller) * Treat setup_scenarios as whole file conflicts
CHANGES FROM v1.10: * Update dependencies * Add error message for mod zips which cannot be parsed
